graph

Class Graph

  • java.lang.Object
    • graph.Graph

  • public class Graph
extends java.lang.Object
    Graph handler class for points. This works on a graph. This is used for finding shortest path between points in map.
    See Also:
    EdgeWeightedDigraph, DirectedEdge

      • shortestPath

        public Connection[] shortestPath(Point from,
                        Point to)
                          throws java.lang.RuntimeException
        Find shortest path between two points.
        Parameters:
        from -
        to -
        Returns:
        Path as array of connections
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if there is no path between points
        See Also:
        Connection, DijkstraSP

      • getXmin

        public double getXmin()
        Getter for path boundary limit value. Used by MapComponent to zoom in on route.
        Returns:
        Smallest x-value on route

      • getXmax

        public double getXmax()
        Getter for path boundary limit value. Used by MapComponent to zoom in on route.
        Returns:
        Biggest x-value on route

      • getYmin

        public double getYmin()
        Getter for path boundary limit value. Used by MapComponent to zoom in on route.
        Returns:
        Smallest y-value on route

      • getYmax

        public double getYmax()
